info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:54PM EDT until August 03 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HURON COUNTY... At 554 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sebewaing, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Pigeon around 610 PM EDT. Owendale around 620 PM EDT. Elkton around 625 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Ivanhoe, Rapson, Verona, Bay Port and Bach. People attending Huron County Fairgrounds should seek safe shelter immediately! TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
